amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used to enter into new contracts with, or new agreements for Federal assistance to, the Islamic Republic of Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds from being used to enter into new contracts with, or new agreements for Federal assistance to, the Islamic Republic of Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Babin.
